PM.text: Climate change is bad because it leads to air pollution.
Air pollution kills many people because it causes lung cancer.
Air pollution also causes poverty by decreasing tourism, which hurts the economy.
Climate change also leads to heatwaves as the ozone effect occurs.
Climate change is bad because it leads to air pollution.
Air pollution kills a lot of people because it causes them to develop lung cancer.
Air pollution also causes poverty by decreasing tourism, which hurts the economy.
Climate change also leads to heatwaves due to the ozone effect.
